name: Wall Clip (galactical)
description:
Mobile link: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=b4f9d07a7352e26acb0592f0b0e31e1d

A short PuzzleScript game about clipping into walls in order to push boxes onto targets. Five levels.

This game was an experiment to see what sokoban might look like without the need for an "undo" button. The mechanics were designed such that each level is solvable from any position.
